title: Cryptomultiplier
author: Cryptomultiplier
content: I just had a flash while reflecting on how my day went and thought how I would have survived without an alternative to fiat. Making passive income this days has grown beyond just fiat, and am glad I did find a way to key in because it would have been worse if only regular employment or white collar or blue collar or reliance on just outdated skills would suffice, mostly now when inflation and charges are the bosses in town.This government knows what control means, and it is in keeping the masses poor, that they retain power. BTC, other cryptocurrencies and the Blockchain technology in general has been a saviour to this philosophy of government, thereby freeing us, its citizens of hardship and over reliance on the corrupt leaders who loot to fill their bellies.Thanks to the brains behind the brilliance of the digital currency and the block chain network, which had led to advancement in technology, innovation and has Forstered a new catalyst of job creation.How do you think it would have been for you without this advent of Bitcoin or cryptocurrency in general?Let's discuss!

comments.author: Truthlovecoins
comments.body: I know the situation am in right now, not having an income that can help much in this economy.  For me, I haven't really earned from Bitcoin or any crypto but am sure it would be better and with more benefit compared to earning in my local currency which is Naira, where I am at the mercy of the banks or their charges and interest rates.Bitcoin is a revelation and am happy to key into it, as it offers both independence and gives one the power over wealth creation and accumulation.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on May 17, 2023, 08:21:52 PMThis government knows what control means, and it is in keeping the masses poor, that they retain power. APC don show this country too much hardship. Na that control we go face if that sick Tinubu and his mean Shettima enter office. The same thing weh make them cause cash scarcity before and during the election go still make them try am again. Now them fit pronounce another ban on bitcoin and na why I deh look some people here weh deh support APC. E go touch everybody when government ban bitcoin trade again. We fit still remember how the thing do us for body that time. This old Nigeria politicians no sabi anything about bitcoin and no go see the financial independence it creates as a positive. Na real wahala we go see now if we  no take time.

comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on May 17, 2023, 08:21:52 PMHow do you think it would have been for you without this advent of Bitcoin or cryptocurrency in general?Life for no balance that much for my side if no be for bitcoin. Thanks to bitcoin sha sae em come to my rescue as this time wey the inflation of things for the country d on high side.Quote from: Truthlovecoins on May 17, 2023, 09:55:17 PMI know the situation am in right now, not having an income that can help much in this economy.  For me, I haven't really earned from Bitcoin or any crypto but am sure it would be better and with more benefit compared to earning in my local currency which is Naira, where I am at the mercy of the banks or their charges and interest rates.The kind of earning wey you d expect from bitcoin or other crypto is it to get it from signature campaign or what? You must not wait for that to happen before you start earning from bitcoin. You go fit invest in bitcoin or any other crypto now and have a long term investment plan or better still you go fit d earn from bitcoin by doing dca strategy. Na up to you to decide which one you wan do sha. Remember sae, the bull run d around the corner. Na by next year em go happen. Investors d invest d way they can, not to miss am

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Bitcoin investment as really helped a lot of people here in general. The government just purposely keep the knowledgeable graduates unemploy and they are romaine around like the uneducated tout on the street. Participating in bitcoin is one of the best things I have sent in life. I know the investment I have been doing will help me in the next bull market to come. My trading account is also doing well and also my investment account is also doing well.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on May 17, 2023, 08:21:52 PMHow do you think it would have been for you without this advent of Bitcoin or cryptocurrency in general?Let's discuss!It wouldn’t have been worse as some will look it as, because without the advent of bitcoin or cryptocurrencies, we would have adapt to the way of life available at the moment and we’ll also have found a way to either follow the government trend or find another possible means of survival amidst every hardship we’ll face with the government regulations being mounted on us as we spend our hard earned money kept in their possessions. Bitcoin has brought us financial freedom, so we are glad we’re already keen into it and making a way of living and survival from it without dependence on the government for a job.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on May 17, 2023, 08:21:52 PMHow do you think it would have been for you without this advent of Bitcoin or cryptocurrency in general?Let's discuss!When one considers the state of this country, which has weak administrations and a weak economy, one can see how difficult it is for the poor messes to even put three meals on the table daily. Without Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency in general, life would not be as simple as it is today for me because there is not job opportunity in the country and if  someone have the opportunity the wages/salary scale is too low in comparison to how expensive things are in the country. Infact Bitcoin and cryptocurrency in general have been a great benefit to the world because many unemployment nowadays are in the crypto industry doings one or two things.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on May 17, 2023, 08:21:52 PMHow do you think it would have been for you without this advent of Bitcoin or cryptocurrency in general?Let's discuss!We can't deny the fact that crypto currency is of great help to all of us who are into it; in fact,  it's an added advantage to those of us who have greater knowledge about it. In reality. I give kudos to it for that. But within myself, I always believe that even without crypto currency being in existence, with the level of hustle a lot of us have out there, we could have actually been able to figure out something for ourselves. I don't know what, but it's actually a reality, because when something seems not to be working for us and the end result of what we are actually doing is not giving us our preferred result, we always seek an alternative option.Crypto has helped a lot of us, giving us a great opportunity to standout, save, and earn more money, adding to whatever we are also getting from our daily or monthly pay job. It has indeed been a helping hand to the uplifting of most people's financial backgrounds right now.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on May 17, 2023, 08:21:52 PMHow do you think it would have been for you without this advent of Bitcoin or cryptocurrency in general?Let's discuss!It's true say the current situation of the country no dey hidden, as na everybody dey experience am, and eh for really bad for most of our youths wey grabbed the opportunities in crypto due to lack of employment and now earning a good decent amount if had it been there was nothing like Bitcoin/crypto in the first place, as I bet you na National sapa dey for within the youths generally. But we thank God for cryptocurrency that came and change the narrative of the government for the interested youths in the country. Bitcoin investment has helped me in the absent of government work. The former APC government was a failed one and let see this new government will do to the teaming youths.

comments.author: Perfectbaby
comments.body: I don't really understand where your post is directing to because co-joining our government and bitcoin. On a normal way, there would have been an alternative out of this; let say for instance those time you didn't know about bitcoin were you dead or no longer copping with the country?? You were because I believe too well that there must be a way out for people to be financially free and gain freedom. Now talking of our government, we know the usual way and we must not talk about them all time because we already inside and what I understand is that "whatever you don't paint green would never benefits you". Meaning if you don't talk good about our country I don't think something could get to your hands because you live inside and yet decides to still against the country. Nigeria is ours and we go no where or leave this country for any.

But indeed bitcoin have played a vital point in my life and I will appreciate always the invention of bitcoin.

comments.body: We really thank God for this forum and bitcoin in this country oo, if not how bois go take chop with this hard economy wey be say even job don hard to get, wey person go talk say make him go look for his daily bread all of us no fit forget this APC regime e never tay wey we finish about new naira note see again na fuel problem we enter make we just dey pray may baba God help us and continue working hard make we no suffer, if no be crypto how we go take dey explain our life now, i even believe say most of us here for don do fraud tay tay.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Cryptocurency and in bitcoin in particular has help this nation and also many nation or should I say it citizens because the government still considered this technology a treat to their dominance and control over the funds of the masses. Imagine a country like el Salvador where bitcoin is legal and used as a legal tender, the citizens there will be at rest to any sort of financial drama from the government and their fiat currency depreciation problems. People would save money now and have a rest of mind knowing fully well their funds are safe from constant deduction of fees and levees from the government and their fiat system.
